title: New computer league download stuck at 0%?
body: I just bought a Lenovo laptop today. After the setup I immediately download league. It ask me if I want to do the open beta thing I said no. It's been almost an hour now and it's stuck at 0%. It says updating inference 1/2 and 2000MB and the kbs changes from 60-300. I have no idea what's going on and any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body:
I'd recommend giving your laptop a quick restart, then launch League as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) to see if anything changes.

Let me know if anything does!

Have you tried to reinstall and then Run League of Legends as administrator?
Also, make sure that your system time is synced via control panel.
Other factors may apply like system RAM, driver updates via divice manager in Control Panel.
Troubleshooting Connection Issues | https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664
